name: Speak
headline: A superhuman, AI-powered language tutor in your pocket

founders.name: Connor Zwick, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Sold previous company Flashcards+ to Chegg (NYSE: CHGG)

generated_description:
### Speak: Your AI-Powered Language Tutor

**Website:** [speak.com](http://speak.com)

**Mission:** Speak aims to be a superhuman, AI-powered language tutor that's always at your fingertips.

#### Company Overview
Speak is positioned centrally in the vibrant tech hub of San Francisco, where a skilled team of 40 is making waves in the educational technology space. It emerged from the Y Combinator Batch W17, and is focused on transforming how people learn languages through a conversational and interactive approach.

#### What Makes Speak Unique?
The cornerstone of Speak's methodology is the recognition that speaking out loud is vital for language acquisition. Their AI, known as Speak Tutor, is designed to feel as real as chatting with a person while providing instant feedback and personalized lessons. This makes learning both engaging and effective, catering to the user's individual style and pace.

#### Key Features
- **Personalization:** Speak Tutor creates a unique curriculum based on your preferences, helping to build a relationship that enhances learning.
- **On-Demand Practice:** You can talk about anything, anytime, allowing for real-world application without the pressure of classroom settings.
- **Accountability:** The AI helps keep learners motivated and on track toward their goals, which can be particularly beneficial for those who struggle with traditional learning methods.

#### Popularity & Reviews
With over 10 million downloads and an impressive 4.8-star rating, users praise Speak as a revolutionary tool for language learning. Customers report significant improvements in their fluency and confidence in conversation—a testament to Speak’s effectiveness.

Here are a few user testimonials:
- *“It feels like it understands my motivations at a deep level and every lesson is made just for me.”* — Jessica Park
- *“As a shy person, I speak more English than before I used this app.”* — Blair Lee

#### Getting Started
Speak offers new users a seven-day free trial, allowing them to explore the app's features and experience its AI-powered tutoring style. You can easily access the app on both iOS and Android platforms, or simply sign up via the web.

If you're curious about how to start your language learning journey, or if you have other questions, the user-friendly FAQs on their site provide helpful guidance.

### Conclusion
In a world where communication is increasingly global, Speak offers an innovative, AI-driven approach that breaks down barriers to language learning. Whether you’re a beginner or looking to polish your skills, Speak positions itself as a friendly companion on the path to fluency—becoming not just an app but an indispensable part of your learning journey.
